title: So Are There Any Extremely Bloody and Violent Games Where You Beat The Shit Out of Something?
body: Literally the only thing I want to do after playing VS {{champion:1}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:238}}

replies.body: Not bloody enough. My tilt is literally 10x further than that.

http://orig02.deviantart.net/33cc/f/2015/108/b/8/i_dunno_man_by_jad0n-d8q65mc.jpg
You can lose in that and go on tilt even harder. I want a guaranteed win.
play on the easiest mode and beat the living crap out of them, or go into practice mode where they don't fight back and just beat them like the annie they are.
